GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves a json representation with the key of topics and the value of an array of topic objects.

GET /api/articles.description: serves a json representation with the key of articles and the value of an array of article objects. Accepts queries ( e.g /api/articles?sort_by=title&order=asc) : sort_by ( valid column, default 'created_at'), order ('asc' or 'desc', default 'desc')and topic (to filter articles by topic).

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a json representation with the key of article and the value of an article object
